channel.title: +1 Forward - Ross Rifles - Kickstarter Edition
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/ross-rifles-ks-edition
Rach interviews Daniel and Daniel from Dundas West Games about their Kickstarter edition of *Ross Rifles.*
**Timecodes:** 01:54 - Read a Sitch about actual horror vs. supernatural horror in RPGs 09:45 - Open your Brain.. to Ross Rifles 25:39 - Act Under Fire with Rach's Replacement and Daniel's Scrounger in the trenches!
**KS link:** https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dundaswestgames/ross-rifles

item.title: +1 Forward - Ross Rifles - Kickstarter Edition
item.dc:creator: @Deckard
item.description:
@Deckard wrote:

I am an excited backer! Designing a great game and teaching autistic kids in a museum interspersed with rpgs as a job is amazing! I can’t wait to listen to this!

Read full topic
